template.name: WildFly Server by JMX
template.description:
Official JMX Template for WildFly. The metrics are collected by JMX. This template works with standalone and domain instances. You can set {$WILDFLY.USER} and {$WILDFLY.PASSWORD} macros in the template for using on the host level.
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback
Template tooling version used: 0.41

trigger.name: WildFly: Failed to fetch info data
trigger.event_name: WildFly: Failed to fetch info data (or no data for 15m)
trigger.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 15 minutes

item.name: WildFly: Launch type
item.description: The manner in which the server process was launched. Either "DOMAIN" for a domain mode server launched by a Host Controller, "STANDALONE" for a standalone server launched from the command line, or "EMBEDDED" for a standalone server launched as an embedded part of an application running in the same virtual machine.

item.name: WildFly: Name
item.description: For standalone mode: The name of this server. If not set, defaults to the runtime value of InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostName(). For domain mode: The name given to this domain

item.name: WildFly: Process type
item.description: The type of process represented by this root resource.

item.name: WildFly: Version
item.description: The version of the WildFly Core based product release

trigger.expression: last(/WildFly Server by JMX/jmx["jboss.as:management-root=server","productVersion"],#1)<>last(/WildFly Server by JMX/jmx["jboss.as:management-root=server","productVersion"],#2) and length(last(/WildFly Server by JMX/jmx["jboss.as:management-root=server","productVersion"]))>0
trigger.name: WildFly: Version has changed
trigger.description: WildFly version has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: WildFly: Runtime configuration state
item.description: The current persistent configuration state, one of starting, ok, reload-required, restart-required, stopping or stopped.

trigger.name: WildFly: Server needs to restart for configuration change.

item.name: WildFly: Server controller state
item.description: The current state of the server controller; either STARTING, RUNNING, RESTART_REQUIRED, RELOAD_REQUIRED or STOPPING.

trigger.name: WildFly: Server controller is not in RUNNING state

dependency.name: WildFly: Server needs to restart for configuration change.

item.name: WildFly: Transactions: Aborted, rate
item.description: The number of aborted (i.e. rolledback) transactions per second.

item.name: WildFly: Transactions: Application rollbacks, rate
item.description: The number of transactions that have been rolled back by application request. This includes those that timeout, since the timeout behavior is considered an attribute of the application configuration.

item.name: WildFly: Transactions: Heuristics, rate
item.description: The number of transactions which have terminated with heuristic outcomes.

item.name: WildFly: Transactions: Current
item.description: The number of transactions that have begun but not yet terminated.

item.name: WildFly: Transactions: Nested, rate
item.description: The total number of nested (sub) transactions created.

item.name: WildFly: Transactions: ResourceRollbacks, rate
item.description: The number of transactions that rolled back due to resource (participant) failure.

item.name: WildFly: Transactions: System rollbacks, rate
item.description: The number of transactions that have been rolled back due to internal system errors.

item.name: WildFly: Transactions: Timed out, rate
item.description: The number of transactions that have rolled back due to timeout.

item.name: WildFly: Transactions: Total, rate
item.description: The total number of transactions (top-level and nested) created per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly deployment [{#DEPLOYMENT}]: Enabled time
item_prototype.description: Indicates if the deployment is managed (aka uses the ContentRepository).

item_prototype.name: WildFly deployment [{#DEPLOYMENT}]: Enabled
item_prototype.description: Boolean indicating whether the deployment content is currently deployed in the runtime (or should be deployed in the runtime the next time the server starts.)

item_prototype.name: WildFly deployment [{#DEPLOYMENT}]: Managed
item_prototype.description: Indicates if the deployment is managed (aka uses the ContentRepository).

item_prototype.name: WildFly deployment [{#DEPLOYMENT}]: Persistent
item_prototype.description: Indicates if the deployment is managed (aka uses the ContentRepository).

item_prototype.name: WildFly deployment [{#DEPLOYMENT}]: Status
item_prototype.description: The current runtime status of a deployment. Possible status modes are OK, FAILED, and STOPPED. FAILED indicates a dependency is missing or a service could not start. STOPPED indicates that the deployment was not enabled or was manually stopped.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/WildFly Server by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",status],#1)<>last(/WildFly Server by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",status],#2) and length(last(/WildFly Server by JMX/jmx["{#JMXOBJ}",status]))>0
trigger_prototype.name: WildFly deployment [{#DEPLOYMENT}]: Deployment status has changed
trigger_prototype.event_name: WildFly deployment [{#DEPLOYMENT}]: Deployment status has changed (new status: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger_prototype.description: Deployment status has changed. Ack to close.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Cache access, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of times that the statement cache was accessed per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Cache add, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of statements added to the statement cache per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Cache current size
item_prototype.description: The number of prepared and callable statements currently cached in the statement cache.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Cache delete, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of statements discarded from the cache per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Cache hit, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of times that statements from the cache were used per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Cache miss, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of times that a statement request could not be satisfied with a statement from the cache per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Statistics enabled
item_prototype.description: Define whether runtime statistics are enabled or not.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Active
item_prototype.description: The number of open connections.

trigger_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: There are no active connections for 5m

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Available
item_prototype.description: The available count.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Blocking time, avg
item_prototype.description: Average Blocking Time for pool.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Creating time, avg
item_prototype.description: The average time spent creating a physical connection.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Get time, avg
item_prototype.description: The average time spent obtaining a physical connection.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Pool time, avg
item_prototype.description: The average time for a physical connection spent in the pool.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Usage time, avg
item_prototype.description: The average time spent using a physical connection

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Blocking failure, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of failures trying to obtain a physical connection per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Created, rate
item_prototype.description: The created per second

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Destroyed, rate
item_prototype.description: The destroyed count.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Idle
item_prototype.description: The number of physical connections currently idle.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: In use
item_prototype.description: The number of physical connections currently in use.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Used, max
item_prototype.description: The maximum number of connections used.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Statistics enabled
item_prototype.description: Define whether runtime statistics are enabled or not.

trigger_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: JDBC monitoring statistic is not enabled
WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Pools monitoring statistic is not enabled
trigger_prototype.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 15 minutes

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Timed out, rate
item_prototype.description: The timed out connections per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connections: Wait
item_prototype.description: The number of requests that had to wait to obtain a physical connection.

trigger_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Too many waiting connections
trigger_prototype.event_name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Too many waiting connections (over {$WILDFLY.CONN.WAIT.MAX.WARN} for 5m)

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Commit time, avg
item_prototype.description: The average time for a XAResource commit invocation.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Commit, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of XAResource commit invocations per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: End time, avg
item_prototype.description: The average time for a XAResource end invocation.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: End, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of XAResource end invocations per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Forget time, avg
item_prototype.description: The average time for a XAResource forget invocation.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Forget, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of XAResource forget invocations per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Prepare time, avg
item_prototype.description: The average time for a XAResource prepare invocation.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Prepare, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of XAResource prepare invocations per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Recover time, avg
item_prototype.description: The average time for a XAResource recover invocation.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Recover, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of XAResource recover invocations per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Rollback time, avg
item_prototype.description: The average time for a XAResource rollback invocation.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Rollback, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of XAResource rollback invocations per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Start time, avg
item_prototype.description: The average time for a XAResource start invocation.

item_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: XA: Start rate
item_prototype.description: The number of XAResource start invocations per second.

trigger_prototype.name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connection usage is too high
trigger_prototype.event_name: WildFly {#JMX_DATA_SOURCE}: Connection usage is too high (over {$WILDFLY.CONN.USAGE.WARN.MAX} in 5m)

item_prototype.name: WildFly listener {#HTTP_LISTENER}: Bytes received, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of bytes that have been received by this listener per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly listener {#HTTP_LISTENER}: Bytes sent, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of bytes that have been sent out on this listener per second.

item_prototype.name: WildFly listener {#HTTP_LISTENER}: Errors, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of 500 responses that have been sent by this listener per second.

trigger_prototype.name: WildFly listener {#HTTP_LISTENER}: There are 500 responses by this listener.

item_prototype.name: WildFly listener {#HTTP_LISTENER}: Requests, rate
item_prototype.description: The number of requests this listener has served per second.

macro.description: The maximum connection usage percent for trigger expression.
The maximum number of waiting connections for trigger expression.
